status: Sampling Sex ; Sampling Sex: Araeda and Sakuma ; Sampling Sex: Araeda-kun to Sakuma-san ; サンプリング・セックス ; サンプリング・セックス：荒枝くんと佐久間さん
description:
Description :
        Read Sampling Sex and it's sequel Sampling Sex: Araeda and Sakuma on Futekiya

Araeda may have gotten himself into his college friend’s adult toy company, but he’d never really thought of putting his hands on the merchandise – not until big, burly Sakuma asks him for some help! Araeda’s skills may be focused on device connectivity, but is that the only thing he wants to connect with Sakuma right now?
